DOC.brief_summary: - To compare the effect of pramipexole on depressive symptoms in early and advanced PD patients - To evaluate the course of depressive symptoms measured with UPDRS Part I (mentation, behavior and mood) and with HADS-D under pramipexole treatment - To investigate whether improvement of depressive symptoms is linked to improvement in motor function (UPDRS Part III)
DOC.brief_title: Non-interventional Observational Study With Pramipexole: Impact on Non-motor Symptoms in Parkinson's Disease
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Idiopathic Parkinsons disease with or without fluctuations 2. Indication for treatment with Sifrol® 3. Male or female patients of age 4. Presence of at least mild depressive symptoms (as judged by the treating physician) 5. Ability to reliably complete a selfrating scale (HADS) Exclusion criteria: 1. Any contraindications according to the Summary of Product Characteristics (SPC): hypersensitivity to pramipexole or to any of the excipients. 2. Ongoing treatment with Sifrol®.
